name: Wrath of Achilles
details: Achilles refuses to fight after a dispute with Agamemnon.

name: Abduction of Helen
details: Paris abducts Helen, starting the Trojan War.

name: Death of Patroclus
details: Patroclus is killed by Hector during a battle while wearing Achilles' armor.

name: Duel with Hector
details: Achilles fights Hector and kills him to avenge Patroclus.

name: Judgment of Paris
details: Paris chooses Aphrodite over Hera and Athena, leading to the Trojan War.

name: Trojan Horse
details: Odysseus' plan leads to the Greek victory and the fall of Troy.

name: Fall of Troy
details: Troy is destroyed by the Greeks after a decade-long war.
